Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Includes persons holding positions by appointment or employment in the organized militia of the state as public employees
Summary: Amends the definition of public employee to include persons holding positions by appointment or employment in the organized militia of the state.
LawCode: Amd ยง201, Civ Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil service law, in relation to including persons holding positions by appointment or employment in the organized militia of the state as public employees
